div.p: This value set includes codes based on the following rules:

ul.li: Include codes fromhttp://loinc.org where ORDER_OBS = Order, where the codes are contained in http://hl7.org/fhir/uv/ips/ValueSet/results-laboratory-observations-uv-ips
Include codes fromhttp://loinc.org where ORDER_OBS = Both, where the codes are contained in http://hl7.org/fhir/uv/ips/ValueSet/results-laboratory-observations-uv-ips

description.value: List of LOINC Laboratory codes of type 'Order' or 'Both. This value set is built upon the IPS value set 'Results Laboratory Observation - IPS'
